tool_description: This API aggregates Remote Jobs from various sources.
name: Remote Job Listings
title: Remote Job Listings

api_list.name: /remotejobs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-job-listings.p.rapidapi.com/remotejobs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-job-listings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
